review_blob:
pours beautiful black color. roasty, charcoal a little coffee on the nose.
very sweet malts with a little bitterness on the end. full body but just enough to hold it all together, drinks nicely but i think its too sweet to be a session stout for me.

2007. golden amber. white head dissipates quickly. aromas: dough, a little wetgrass. 
taste: sand, a little spice. sweet, acidic and smooth
body: rolls right over the tongue. skips the front of the palate rolls right down the throat
